messages.body:
LEGAL PRACTITIONER. NIGERIA



COMPLIMENT OF THE SEASON.

GRACE AND PEACE AND LOVE FROM THIS PART OF THE
ATLANTIC TO YOU. I HOPE MY LETTER DOES NOT CAUSEYOU
TOO MUCH EMBARRASSMENT AS I WRITE TO YOU IN GOOD
FAITH. BASED ON THE CONTACT ADDRESS GIVEN TO ME BY A
FRIEND WHO WORKS AT THE NIGERIAN EMBASSY IN YOUR
COUNTRY.
PLEASE EXCUSE MY INTRUSION INTO YOUR PRIVATE LIFE.

I AM BARRISTER PHILIPS AJAYI, I REPRESENT MOHAMMED
ABACHA, SON OF THE LATE GEN. SANI ABACHA, WHO WAS THE
FORMER MILITARY HEAD OF STATE IN NIGERIA. HE DIED IN
1998. SINCE HIS, THE FAMILY HAS BEEN LOOSING A LOT OF
MONEY DUE TO VINDICTIVE GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS WHO ARE
BENT ON DEALING WITH THE FAMILY. BASED ON THIS
THEREFORE, THE FAMILY HAS ASKED ME TO SEEK FOR A
FOREIGN PARTNER WHO CAN WORK WITH US AS TO MOVE OUT
THE TOTAL SUM OF US$75,000,000.00 ( SEVENTY FIVE
MILLION UNITED STATES DOLLARS), PRESENTLY IN THEIR
POSSESSION. THIS MONEY WAS OF COURSE, ACQUIRED BY THE
LATE PRESIDENT AND IS NOW KEPT SECRETLY BY THE FAMILY.

THE SWISS GOVERNMENT HAS ALREADY FROZEN ALL THE
ACCOUNTS OF THE FAMILY IN SWITZERLAND, AND SOME OTHER
COUNTRIES WOULD SOON FOLLOW TO DO THE SAME. THIS BID
BY SOME GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS TO DEAL WITH THIS FAMILY
HAS MADE IT NECESSARY THAT WE SEEK YOUR ASSISITANCE
TO RECEIVE THIS MONEY AND IN INVESTING IT ON BEHALF OF
THE FAMILY.


THIS MUST BE A JOINT VENTURE TRANSACTION AND WE MUST
ALL WORK TOGETHER.
SINCE THIS MONEY IS STILL CASH, EXTRA SECURITY
MEASURES HAVE BEEN TAKEN TO PROTECT IT FROM THEFT OR
SEIZURE, PENDING WHEN AGREEMENT IS REACHED ON WHEN AND
HOW TO MOVE IT INTO ANY OF YOUR NOMINATEDBANK
ACCOUNTS. I HAVE PERSONALLY WORKED OUT ALL MODALITIES
FOR THE PEACEFUL CONCLUSION OF THIS TRANSACTION. THE
TRANSACTION DEFINITELY WOULD BE HANDLED IN PHASES AND
THE FIRST PHASE WILL INVOLVE THE MOVING OF
US$25,000,000.00(TWENTY FIVE MILLION UNITED STATES
DOLLARS).

MY CLIENTS ARE WILLING TO GIVE YOU A REASONABLE
PERCENTAGE OF THIS MONEY AS SOON AS THE TRANSACTION IS
CONCLUDED. I WILL, HOWEVER, BASED ON THE GROUNDS THAT
YOU ARE WILLING TO WORK WITH US AND ALSO ALL
CONTENTIOUS ISSUES DISCUSSED BEFORE THE COMMENCEMENT
OF THIS TRANSACTION. YOU MAY ALSO DISCUSS YOUR
PERCENTAGE BEFORE WE START TO WORK. AS SOON AS I HEAR
FROM YOU, I WILL GIVE YOU ALL NECESSARY DETAILS AS TO
HOW WE INTEND TO CARRY OUT THE WHOLE TRANSACTION.

PLEASE, DO NOT ENTERTAIN ANY FEARS, AS ALL NECESSARY
MODALITIES ARE IN PLACE, AND I ASSURE YOU OF ALL
SUCCESS AND SAFETY IN THIS TRANSACTION.

PLEASE, THIS TRANSACTION REQUIRES ABSOLUTE
CONFIDENTIALITY AND YOU WOULD BE EXPECTED TO TREAT IT
AS SUCH UNTIL THE FUNDS ARE MOVED OUT OF THIS COUNTRY.

PLEASE, YOU WILL ALSO IGNORE THIS LETTER AND RESPECT
OUR TRUST IN YOU BY NOT EXPOSING THIS TRANSACTION,
EVEN IF YOU ARE NOT INTERESTED.

ENDEAVOUR TO RESPOND THROUGH THIS MY CONFIDENTIAL
EMAIL ADDRESS:

philipajayi@indiatimes.com

I LOOK FORWARDS TO WORKING WITH YOU.

THANK YOU.

TRULY YOURS

BARRISTER PHILIPS AJAYI.
messages.raw:
BARRISTER PHILIPS AJAYI

PLEASE, DO NOT ENTERTAIN ANY FEARS, AS ALL NECESSARY MODALITIES ARE IN PLACE, AND I ASSURE YOU OF ALL SUCCESS AND SAFETY IN THIS TRANSACTION.

PLEASE, THIS TRANSACTION REQUIRES ABSOLUTE CONFIDENTIALITY AND YOU WOULD BE EXPECTED TO TREAT IT AS SUCH UNTIL THE FUNDS ARE MOVED OUT OF THIS COUNTRY.

PLEASE, YOU WILL ALSO IGNORE THIS LETTER AND RESPECT OUR TRUST IN YOU BY NOT EXPOSING THIS TRANSACTION, EVEN IF YOU ARE NOT INTERESTED.

ENDEAVOUR TO RESPOND THROUGH THIS MY CONFIDENTIAL EMAIL ADDRESS:

philipajayi@indiatimes.com

I LOOK FORWARDS TO WORKING WITH YOU.

THANK YOU.

TRULY YOURS

BARRISTER PHILIPS AJAYI.

messages.body:
philisp_emovon@yahoo.com


TEL: 234 8023649122




THANK YOU FOR RESPONDING APPROPRIATELY TO THE PROPOSAL
I SEND ON BEHALF OF MY
CLIENTS.
I HAVE COMMUNICATED YOUR RESPONSE TO MY CLIENTS AND
THEY WERE GLAD OVER IT.

THEY HAVE INSTRUCTED ME TO CARRY ON WITH YOU WITHOUT
THEIR INVOLVEMENT. THIS
IS DUE TO THE CONTINUOUS DETERIORATION OF THEIR
RELATIONSHIP WITH THE PRESENT
GOVERNMENT AND FOR THE FACT THAT ALL EYES ARE ON THEM
BECAUSE ALL NIGERIANS
ARE ACCUSING THEIR DISEASED FATHER OF MASS LOOTING OF
THE NIGERIA TREASURY
DURING HIS FIVE YEARS REIGN AS A MILITARY DICTATOR.

THIS TRANSACTION HAS BEEN COMMITTED TO MY TRUST NOT
BECAUSE I HAVE BEEN THEIR
FAMILY ATTORNEY FOR YEARS BUT BECAUSE THEY FEEL I CAN
BE TRUSTED AND I HAVE
THE CONNECTION TO TRANSFER THIS FUND WITH HITCH FREE.
NOW THAT I HAVE ACCEPTED
THE RESPONSIBILITY I CANNOT AFFORD TO FAIL.

I HAVE CONTACTED AN INTERNATIONAL BROKER WHO IS A
CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
(CEO) OF A SECURITY COMPANY IN NIGERIA TO BROKE THIS
TRANSACTION FOR US, HE
HAS GIVEN ME IS CONFIDENCE TO HELP US TO TRANSPORT
THIS CONSIGNMENT OF CASH
WITH HIS DIPLOMATIC CONNECTION.

THIS BROKER HAS TOLD ME THAT HIS CONNECTION WILL BE
ABLE TO CONVEY THIS
CONSIGNMENT TO EUROPE WHERE YOU WILL GO AND TAKE TOTAL
POSSESSION OF THE FUND.

WE ARE GOING TO CONVEY THE CASH IN THREE DIFFERENT
INSTALLMENT FOR SECURITY
REASONS, WHAT I MEAN BY THIS IS THAT BEFORE AND AFTER
THE TRANSFER OF THE
FIRST INSTALLMENT WHICH IS 25 MILLION USD, WE WOULD
HAVE BEEN ABLE TO
ESTERBLISH A VERY PERFECT BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP BASED
ON UTMOST GOOD FAITH,
SINCERITY AND TRUST THAT WILL PAVE WAY FOR SUBSIQUENT
TRANSFERS.

THE METHOD WE HAVE CHOSEN TO ADOPT IN THIS TRANSFER
PROCESS IS A VERY STRAIGHT
FORWARD ONE AND LESS COMPLEX IF WE HAVE AGREEABLE
WORKING TERMS. AS AT NOW I
HAVE DEPOSITED NINE TRUNK BUSES CONTAINING THE ENTIRE
USD75, 000,000.00 WITH
THE SECURITY FIRM.

AS SOON AS WE DISCUSS AND WE ARE ABLE TO ARRIVE AT A
COMPROMISE I WILL
IMMEDIATELY GIVE THE GO AHEAD TO THE SECURITY FIRM TO
CONVEY THE FIRST THREE
TRUNK BOXES CONTAINING THE FIRST INSTALLMENT OF THE
US$ 25 MILLION.


AS YOU MAY BE AWARE THAT IT IS VERY DIFFICULT TO
CONVEY SUCH A HUGE AMOUNT OF
MONEY THROUGH COURIER SERVICE OR ANY OTHER MEANS. THIS
INTERNATIONAL BROKER
HAS PROMISE TO WORK WITH US CONFIDENTIALLY IF WE ARE
READY TO WORK WITH HIM.

THIS TRANSACTION WILL BE IN TWO STAGES.

THE FIRST STAGE WILL BE MY RESPONSIBILITY. THIS WILL
INVOLVE THE PROCESS OF
HAVING THE CONSIGNMENT (CARGO) OF CASH CONVEY TO
EUROPE WERE YOU WILL GO AND
TAKE POSSESSION OF IT. SO I HAVE PERFECTED THE
MODALITY TO CONVEY THIS
CONSIGNMENT (CARGO) OF CASH TO EUROPE WITH MY BROKER.

THE SECOND STAGE WILL START WHEN MY BROKER AS CONVEYED
THE CARGO TO EUROPE. SO
YOUR RESPONSIBILITY IS TO TAKE POSSESSION OF THE CASH
AND HAVE IT LODGE INTO
AN ACCOUNT.   THIS MEANS YOU WILL HAVE THE
RESPONSIBILITY OF TRANSFERRING THE
CASH INTO YOUR ACCOUNT IN YOUR COUNTRY.

OUR BROKER IS WAITING TO HEAR FROM YOU, FOR HIM TO
IMMEDIATELY START THE
PROCESS OF CONVEYING THE CONSIGNMENT / CARGO.

FOR SO MANY REASONS I CANNOT AFFORD TO BRING OUR 60%
BACK TO THE COUNTRY IN
CASH FORM. I INTEND TO LIVE IT ON YOUR TRUST UNTIL AT
LEAST ONE MEMBER OF MY
CLIENT FAMILY AND I WILL BE ABLE TO COME DOWN TO YOUR
COUNTRY. THIS IS WHERE
WE WILL NEED YOUR TRUST AND WEALTH OF EXPERIENCE. IN
ADDITION TO YOUR 30%, ALL
EXPENSES INCURRED BY YOU IN THE COURSE OF ACTUALISING
THIS TRANSFER WILL BE
DEFRAYED FROM THE 10% SET ASIDE SOLELY FOR EXPENSES IF
PROPERLY DOCUMENTED
AFTER THE MONEY HAS BEEN SUCCESSFULLY TRANSFERRED INTO
YOUR POSSESSION.

 ENDEAVOUR TO SEND ME YOUR CONFIDENTIAL FAX, TELEPHONE
NUMBERS AND YOUR
CONTACT ADDRESS.

PLEASE, MAKE CONFIDENTIALITY YOUR WATCHWORD IN THIS
TRANSACTION.

FOR CONFIDENTIALITY ALL MY SUBSEQUENT MESSAGES ARE TO
BE SENT TO THIS MY EMAIL
ADDRESS.

I   ENCOURAGE YOU  TO  GIVE  ME  A  CALL  DAILY  AS
THIS  REASSURES  US  A
GREAT  DEAL  OF  THE  TRUST  WE  HAVE  IN  YOU.
CONSIDERING THE  HUGE  SUM
OF  MONEY  WE  INTEND  TO  LEAVE  IN  YOUR  CARE
PENDING  OUR  ARRIVAL  IN
YOUR  COUNTRY,  I  THINK  IT  IS  IN  OUR  COLLECTIVE
INTEREST  TO  BUILD  A
STRONG  RELATIONSHIP  AND  THIS  CAN  ONLY  BE
ACHIEVED  FOR  NOW  THROUGH
CONVERSATIONS  WITH  EACH  OTHER.

IT IS EASY TO GET THROUGH TO OUR LINES BETWEEN 4PM TO
10PM YOUR TIME.

MAKE SURE YOU CALL ME TODAY OR TOMORROW FOR DISCUSSION
SO THAT I CAN AS WELL
GIVE YOU OUR BROKER'S TELEPHONE NUMBERS AND START
CONTACTING HIM DIRECTLY.

IF THERE IS ANY PORTION OF THIS MESSAGE OR TRANSACTION
YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND,
YOU ARE VERY FREE TO ASK QUESTIONS, AS I WILL BE VERY
GRATEFUL TO ATTEND TO
YOUR WORRIES.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR ANTICIPATED CO-OPERATION.

I WILL BE ANXIOUSLY WAITING FOR YOUR CALL

BEST REGARDS
messages.raw:
BARRISTER PHILIPS AJAYI

234 8023649122

From:Philip Ajayi

I am worried over this your refusal to call me
in-spite of my call for it.

Our Broker in Amsterdam is worried over not hearing
from you because before he decided to embark on this
venture I promise him you will be in Amsterdam with
him not later than 48 hours after he as successfully
convey the consignment to Amsterdam. Your unusual
behavior as made me to look like a fool in the sight
of
our Broker.

Please, kindly let me know if you are still interested
in this transaction or not so that I know how to forge
ahead.

I will be anxiously waiting to hear from you.

Best regards.

messages.body:
234 8023649122

Dear Candy ,

Sequel to my last correspondence.

Mr. Wesley is seriously worried that he has not heard
from you.

This is Scan copy of my International Passport and
Scan copy of my client's driver's Licence Mohammed
Abacha.

He is the eldest son of our deceased Dictator
President General Sanni Abacha.

I hope with this you have known who I am and who you
are dealing with. I also hope With this you will be
more sensitive to this transaction so that we can
conclude withing the shortest possible time.

I will subsequently be sending you LIMITED POWER OF
ATTORNEY from our local Court here in Nigeria. This
will enable you have Legal claim to the consignment.

You should immediately Scan and send to Mr. Wesley
Stephens copy of your International Passport  or
Driver's Licence for identification as he has asked
you.This is because he just called me that he has
asked you for this any of these documents or if you
cannot be able to make it to Spain withing the
shortest possible time you can as well discuss if it
is possible to make alternative arrangement for you.

I urge you to get in touch with Mr. Wesley Stephens so
that we can immediatyely forge ahead.

Please, let me know your travelling Schedule to Spain
or how far you have gone with him about the
alternative arrangement.

I am still waiting to receive your mobile phone number
where you can be reached at any time of the day. Help
me to remind  your Uncle Marmite Luny-Binns to
acknowledge the receipt of my last mail, were I asked
him to send me his phone number so I can call him for
discussion.


Endeavour to always keep me updated on every
development you will be having with Mr. Wesley
Stephens.

Remain blessed.
messages.raw:
BARRISTER PHILIPS AJAYI

234 8023649122

You should immediately Scan and send to Mr. Wesley Stephens copy of your International Passport or Driver's Licence for identification as he has asked you.This is because he just called me that he has asked you for this any of these documents or if you cannot be able to make it to Spain withing the shortest possible time you can as well discuss if it is possible to make alternative arrangement for you.

I urge you to get in touch with Mr. Wesley Stephens so that we can immediatyely forge ahead.

messages.body:
Cc: philisp_emovon@yahoo.com

My dear

I am sadly doubtful as the reliability of this gentleman. Not only is it very difficult to establish telephone communication, but his communication skills appear limited which at first I was tempted to ascribe to the climate and excessive local imbibing common to these folks, but now I feel it is more deliberately planned. Perhaps it may be better if you do not get your hopes up, and I am sure that we can change our travel arrangements to somewhere else if needs be.  However let us see what is to be done.

Best regards to your mother, and I will be around for tea and crumpet later.

Uncle M xx

Sir Marmite Luny-Binns DFC
Regis Court Chamberlain
The Court of St James
Broadmoor
London FU2 GIT
messages.raw:
SIR MARMITE LUNY-BINNS

To: HRH Princess Candice Windsor
Cc: philisp_emovon@yahoo.com

My dear

I am sadly doubtful as the reliability of this gentleman. Not only is it very difficult to establish telephone communication, but his communication skills appear limited which at first I was tempted to ascribe to the climate and excessive local imbibing common to these folks, but now I feel it is more deliberately planned. Perhaps it may be better if you do not get your hopes up, and I am sure that we can change our travel arrangements to somewhere else if needs be. However let us see what is to be done.

Best regards to your mother, and I will be around for tea and crumpet later.

Uncle M xx

Sir Marmite Luny-Binns DFC
Regis Court Chamberlain
The Court of St James

London FU2 GIT

Sequel to your last correspondence.

Mr. Wesley is seriously worried that he has not still heard from you.

Please, send me your phone number so that I can call you to discuss on how we can forge ahead.

You can as well call me.

I am waiting to hear from you.

Remain blessed.

234 8023649122

Dear Candice,

Sequel to your last correspondences.

I have been trying to reach you since yesterday. I
dropped message on your answering machine yesterday
night. You will excuse me in this regard because
Nigeria is a third world country with obsolete
communication system. This makes it very difficult to
call or receive calls from abroad.

ItÕs like you were having difficulties in hearing me
when I called you earlier today.

Truly I was worried if you were actually with me in
this transaction in good Faith.

Candice, are you actually with me in good faith in
this transaction now?

If you canÕt understand my ascent, I think we can be
communication through email for now.

Candice, our broker Mr. Wesley is seriously worried
over this undue delay this transaction has suffered.
He is very anxious to speak with you, to know the
future of this transaction in your hands.

Please, let me hear from you so that I can get him
connected to you in Spain.

Candice, you can call me this night so that we can try
to discuss on how to forge ahead.

I am anxiously waiting to hear from you.

Remain blessed.

Dear Candice,

Sequel to your last correspondences.

I have been trying to reach you since yesterday. I dropped message on your answering machine yesterday night. You will excuse me in this regard because Nigeria is a third world country with obsolete communication system. This makes it very difficult to call or receive calls from abroad.

ItÕs like you were having difficulties in hearing me when I called you earlier today.

Truly I was worried if you were actually with me in this transaction in good Faith.

Candice, are you actually with me in good faith in this transaction now?

If you canÕt understand my ascent, I think we can be communication through email for now.

Candice, our broker Mr. Wesley is seriously worried over this undue delay this transaction has suffered. He is very anxious to speak with you, to know the future of this transaction in your hands.

Please, let me hear from you so that I can get him connected to you in Spain.

Candice, you can call me this night so that we can try to discuss on how to forge ahead.

I am anxiously waiting to hear from you.

Remain blessed.
